FitzRoy.text:
Wind
In south, variable 2 or 3, becoming southerly 4 to 6. In north, southeasterly, veering southerly or southwesterly, 4 to 6, occasionally 7 later, perhaps gale 8 later.
Sea state
In south, slight or moderate, becoming moderate or rough later in west. in north, moderate or rough.
Weather
In south, fog patches in southeast, occasional rain in west . In north, rain for a time.
Visibility
In south, moderate or good, occasionally very poor in southeast. In north, good, occasionally poor.
